name: Premier-King-One-Bedroom-Suite-Manhattan-View-Living-Room
caption: Living Room
alt: The one-bedroom Premier suite offers sweeping views of Manhattan. The suite features an entry foyer, expansive living room consisting of a sofa, arm chairs and coffee table and side table. An executive writing desk and chair is located near the bedroom door. A wall mounted 40” TV hangs over the vanity fireplace, and a console with mini bar completes the room. The bedroom consists of a plush king sized bed flanked by two night stands with BoseWave Studio radio featuring Bluetooth connectivity and alarm clock. An arm chair and table is on the far side of the room. A 40” TV on a console is across the bed. The Turkish marble-clad bathroom, located in the bedroom, features a glass enclosed shower, soaking tub with oversized shower heads, plush bathrobes and towels and luxurious Etro bath amenities.
